mapper.select: SELECT b.book_name, b.book_info, b.image_url, a.author_name FROM interest_books ib JOIN books b ON ib.book_id = b.book_id JOIN book_authors ba ON ba.book_id = b.book_id JOIN authors a ON ba.author_id = a.author_id JOIN members m ON ib.member_uid = m.member_uid WHERE m.member_id = #{ memberId } LIMIT #{ pageRequest.limit } OFFSET #{ pageRequest.offset };
